info.name: Vlad Kouzin
info.slogan: A great simplifier of all things technology based

summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer seeking a remote position to leverage my skills in solving complex problems with simple, efficient solutions. Passionate about contributing to a team that values innovation, quality, and growth.

positions.title: Full Stack
achievements: Developed multiple web applications for internal use by engineering and management teams
Built multiple CLI tools to automate common tasks for the engineering team and improve developer onboarding experience
Simplified Docker Compose configurations, designing a clear framework for maintaining and adding new services
Refactored legacy code, improved pipeline run time from over an hour to 7 minutes

positions.title: Full Stack
achievements: Built popular customer-facing tools and add-ons to expand the feature set of Chili Piper
Wrote extensive documentation and "magic" scripts to simplify the onboarding process for new customers
Developed industry leading tools for our Customer Success team, reducing response times and increasing customer satisfaction
Made an internal support portal aggregating data from multiple sources to provide a single source of truth for our Customer Success team
Maintained a Kubernetes cluster with all internal services and tools

projects.name: Pulley
projects.description: A user-friendly CLI tool for pulling and configuring multiple git repositories in parallel once.

projects.name: Aftermath
projects.description: Highly rated Discord Bot used by over 4000 servers. It provides a better in-game progress tracking for World Of Tanks Blitz with a beautiful UI rendered as an image.

projects.name: OpenMemoryDB
projects.description: A lightweight in-memory key-value database with support for persistence and a CRUD API wrapper using Go Fiber.
